item.title: warrenellis: @skirtfulloffire Should be a frontier disease. "Meg and the kids all died a thet pinkberry. So did the horse. I loved thet horse."

item.title: warrenellis: Okay, the faked fouls are pretty funny. The Paraguayan goalie is claiming to have been distracted by "a released Kraken"
